content.description: Sri Lanka, a biodiversity hotspot, boasts a diverse array of wildlife including elephants, leopards, whales, and birds. 12% of the island is dedicated to wildlife conservation. Witness these animals in their natural habitat at sanctuaries, especially in the south and central regions.
highlights: Whale watching, including the majestic blue whale
content.action: Visit Sri Lanka's national parks and sanctuaries for a responsible wildlife watching experience.
